descriptor.name: OYO Rooms
descriptor.long_desc: OYO Rooms is the World's leading chain of hotels and homes

>A relaxed stay is assured at this abode, where the rooms feature trendy wall claddings, modern wooden furniture and offer adequate storage space. Big windows bring in natural light as well.

Location
This property is near Railway Rd, adjacent to BJP office and right under Muthoot Finance, in Gurgaon. Gurugram bus stand, Gurgaon railway station and Indira Gandhi International Airport are easily reachable from this place. Attractions like Leisure Valley Park, Kingdom of Dreams, and Tau Devi Lal Sports Complex are nearby as well.

Amenities
Both AC and non AC rooms come with TV and attached bathroom for your convenience. Free Wi-Fi, 24/7 checkin, daily housekeeping, power backup and CCTV protection are the other facilities.

What's Nearby
In the vicinity of the stay, guests can find eateries like Maa Bhagwati Tiffins, Shudh Vaishno Rasoi, Raj Mahal Delux, Harish Bakery, and Burger Xpress.

descriptor.long_desc:
This hotel is a pocket friendly hotel located at a prime location for a traveller with spacious rooms and basic amenities. Rooms have windows for natural lighting, cabinet for luggage storage and a well-maintained bathroom.

Location

The property is located near the bus stand, prem nagar in Gurgaon. The location is very easily accessible to everyone hence it becomes very easy to locate by everyone. The hotel staff is welcoming and generous enough to help you. The environment is vibrant and decent. The management is highly efficient and excellent at their job.

Amenities

All the rooms have air-conditioning, television and all the other basic amenities. . All the rooms are beautifully decorated to suit your visit. The rooms are fully furnished, huge and luxurious. The hotel never compromises on the cleanliness of the rooms, corridors and the bathrooms for your interest.

What's Nearby

Plenty of eateries and restaurants are around the property for you to dine in and have a snack. The area around the location promises many picturesque locations and a delightful exploration. Visit the Celebration Mall, MGF Metropolitan Mall, Omaxe Mall or DLF City Centre.

descriptor.long_desc:
OYO 83262 Dev Hotels is a budget hotel with standardised amenities at the best value. Located in Gurgaon, this hotel was built to provide comfort and convenience to travellers. Top attractions include 12 km from Ambience Mall and 7 km from Dlf Cyberhub. Amenities include parking facility and in-house restaurant.

Special Features
The modern, sleek design of the rooms is sure to make you feel at home. The hotel rooms come with AC, TV, and Free Wifi.

All the amenities you need to make your stay in this hotel comfortable, from Breakfast to Elevator are available. This hotel also offers 24/7 Checkin.

Location & Transportation
Visitors can easily explore nearby attractions such as Kingdom Of Dreams, Sheetla Mata Mandir and The Westin Gurgaon, New Delhi which are about 2 km, 5 km and 3 km away from the lodging. Guests will be just 8 km from Gurgaon Railway Station. Indira Gandhi International Airport is 16 km away.

★ OYO 83262 Dev Hotels has been delighting guests since 29 Sep 2021.

descriptor.long_desc:
Facilities

Located in the heart of Gurgaon, OYO 310 Hotel Empire Grand promises a great experience to the guests at affordable rates. The OYO is maintained with a skilled and friendly staff to ensure you have a good stay.

Facilities

  • AC, TV and more are equipped in our property.
  • First aid, round the clock security and fire safety are provided to our guests for their safety.
  • We also have a 24-hour helpdesk to offer assistance to the guests at any time.

What's Nearby

  • Head out to visit the key attractions of Gurgaon like Kingdom Of Dreams, Rivoli Gardan Shitla Mata Mandir and Dlf Cyberhub.
  • Need cash? There is Standard Chartered ATM, Yes Bank ATM and UCO Bank ATM nearby this property.

Location
OYO 350 near Medanta is a Budgetfriendly property located in Sector 39, Gurugram. Huda City Centre Metro Station is the nearest metro station.

Special Features
The rooms are well lit and spacious. The decor is simple and classy. Each room has a closet. The hotel also has a seating area.

Amenities
AC, Geyser, Free Wifi, Kitchen, Card Payment, Power backup, CCTV Cameras, Pre Book Meals, Laundry, Parking Facility, Complimentary Breakfast, TV are among the amenities featured at this property for a comfortable stay.

What's Nearby
The restaurants in the vicinity are Hotel Malabar, RJ Kabul Restaurant, Fresh From Oven, The Chocolate Room, and Flavours. Other than the restaurants the guests can also explore the nearby shopping spots like Raheja Mall, Celebration Mall, Big Bazaar, Snowball ERetail Services Private Limited, and DLF Star Mall.

Facilities

  • First aid, round the clock security and fire safety are provided to our guests for their safety.

descriptor.long_desc:
OYO 24416 The United Hotel is centrally located in Mumbai. We have a great range of accommodation options with standardised amenities and excellent value for money. Each room has a kitchenette and CCTV cameras, and we provide complimentary breakfast. With our friendly staff and efficient services, we're sure to exceed your expectations with every stay.

Special Features
Feel at home in these spacious hotel rooms with AC, TV, Free Wifi, Geyser, Queen Sized Bed and Attached Bathroom.

Come to this hotel for your next vacation, or business trip! You will be able to check in any time of the day, pay with a card, pre-order meals, and have access to laundry services. We provide a private entrance for our guests.

Location & Transportation
Guests can visit Band Stand, Red Carpet Wax Museum and Queen'S Necklace - Marine Drive which are about 13 km, 5 km and 23 km away from the property. The hotel is 7 km from Lokmanya Tilak (T) Railway Station. Chhatrapati Shivaji International Airport Mumbai is the main airport serving the city, located at a distance of around 6 km from the hotel.

★ We've served more than 3000 couples as an OYO Host.
★ OYO 24416 The United Hotel has been delighting guests since 27 Nov 2018.

OYO Townhouse is based on the needs of the millennial traveler. Every single element of the hotel – from the breakfast menu to the booking process has been re-engineered for comfort, efficiency, convenience and affordability. Each Townhouse is designed to complement its neighborhood.

descriptor.long_desc:
OYO 26811 Moonlight Residency is a budget hotel with standardised amenities at the best value. With 8 km from Ambience Mall and 4 km from DLF CyberHub, this property is situated near the top attractions in Gurgaon. Guests can enjoy amenities like kitchen, CCTV cameras and breakfast. This hotel offers an unmatched stay experience that exceeds every guest’s expectation.

Special Features
Enjoy a night in one of our AC rooms with a TV and free Wifi. The room also includes a coffee/tea maker, fan, and geyser.

This is a hotel with a lot of amenities to offer. You can pre book your meals, have power backup and card payment facilities.

Location & Transportation
The property is well connected to nearby popular attractions, such as Kingdom of Dreams(6 km), The Westin Gurgaon, New Delhi(6 km), and The Oberoi, Gurgaon(5 km). Guests will be just 12 km from Gurgaon Railway Station. Nearest airport is Delhi International Airport, 17 km from the hotel.

★ Travelling with partner? You're in luck, this hotel has served more than 3000 couple stays as an OYO Host.
★ OYO 26811 Moonlight Residency has been delighting guests since 21 Dec 2018.

descriptor.long_desc:
Did you know that we’ve got 2.5 Crore bookings since March 2020? And this is all thanks to the sanitisation & safety measures followed at our properties, from disinfecting surfaces with high-quality cleaning products and maintaining social distance to using protective gear and more.

Location
Located in Sector 52, Gurgaon OYO 30314 Rv Homes C82 is a modern and elegant property. The property is close to attractions like Tau Devi Lal Bio Diversity Park, Purana Qila and Church Of Immaculate Conception.

Special Features
The rooms have wallpapers, wooden flooring and elegant furniture. The reception is neutrally-toned, well-lit and has modern sofas and complementing curtains.

Amenities
Laundry, 24x7 Accessible Kitchen, Pre Book Meals, Cutlery/Crockery, 24/7 Checkin, Geyser, Room Service, Free Wifi, Modern Wardrobe, TV, Fire-Extinguisher, Power backup, Fan, Mirror, CCTV Cameras, Attached Bathroom are some of the amenities available at this property.

What's Nearby
Brooklyn Restocafe, Aao Ji, The Streat, NOURISH Health Bar and Khanasutra are present in the close proximity of the property.

descriptor.long_desc:
The bustling city of Gurgaon is home to some of the best attractions, shopping malls and business hubs. Hotel OYO 61815 Aashiana is located close to all these places which make it the perfect destination for anyone visiting the area. The hotel provides all amenities at a budget-friendly price with 24/7 checkin. CCTV cameras around the property ensures absolute security with utmost privacy.

Special Features
Enjoy a cool stay in the middle of the summer with AC and fan. This room features free wifi, an attached bathroom, TV, and intercom.

This hotel is a perfect place to stay with free fire-extinguisher, power backup, housekeeping and toiletries. You can also take a dip in the well-equipped wellness centre. Reception is available for any assistance you may need.

Location & Transportation
The accommodation is conveniently stationed 5 km from Kingdom of Dreams, 6 km from Sheetla Mata Mandir and 3 km from SkyJumper Trampoline Park Gurgaon. Guests will be just 7 km from Gurgaon Railway Station. The hotel is 23 km away from Delhi International Airport.

★ OYO 61815 Hotel Aashiana has been delighting guests since 24 Jul 2020.
